about_the_game:
Step into a fresh new corner of Spirit City's room with the Cozy Kitchen DLC! This feast of a DLC expands your Spirit City experience with a brand-new kitchen area.

We've whipped up a tasty menu of new activities for your avatar - from cooking comforting meals, to cleaning the dishes, to unwinding in the kitchen's cozy breakfast nook.

But that's not all—this DLC serves up a new batch of Spirits who each bring their own unique flavor to the kitchen. With new sounds and a pantry stocked with food-themed customization options, you'll have every ingredient you'll need for a great, relaxing time!

Features

  • Newly expanded room! Explore the brand-new cozy kitchen area.

  • A basket full of new Spirits to discover and collect! Including Capybun, a loafy capybara who loves soaking in hot soup.

  • Delicious new soundscapes to immerse you in the kitchen experience

  • New kitchen activities for your avatar!

  • And more to be revealed!

name: Spirit City: Lofi Sessions - Cozy Kitchen DLC
short_description: Step into a fresh new corner of Spirit City's room with the Cozy Kitchen DLC! This feast of a DLC expands your Spirit City experience with a brand-new kitchen area. New items, spirits and activities await!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
